mainText:
I was 6 years old when my father bought me my first Apple computer: the Apple IIc. I wrote my thesis about Steve Jobs' managerial approaches on an iBook G4. I wished my mom happy birthday today via FaceTime, while I'm on my iPhone 4 and she is on an iPad I bought for her. I'm writing this email on my MacBook Pro. 

He's improved life in ways unimaginable. The man is a legend. And I hope Apple continues his ingenious work by carrying his vision in everything they do.
author: Kelley
